i1.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Shyvana''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|5 '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|5 '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, which is increased by 5 for every [[File:Elemental Drakes icon.png|16px|link=]]  [[elemental drake]] and {{ui|Elder Dragon}} her team slays.
Additionally, '''Shyvana''' deals 20% '''bonus''' {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|magic damage}} to Dragons.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Shyvana gains 5 bonus armor and 5 bonus magic resistance, which is increased by 5 for every File:Elemental Drakes icon.png elemental drake and Elder Dragon her team slays.
Additionally, Shyvana deals 20% bonus physical damage and magic damage to Dragons.

q1.name: Twin Bite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{as|100% AD}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}} and causes her to strike again after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, which deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
Basic attacks {{sti|cdr|reduce}} ''Twin Bite's'' cooldown by {{fd|0.5}} seconds {{tip|on-hit}}.
''Twin Bite'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Shyvana's''' basic attack timer.

{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}} Bonus:}} '''Shyvana''' instantly attacks enemies in a cone around the target before applying ''Twin Bite's'' effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal {{as|100% AD}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}}, are affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers, and apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot {{tip|critically strike}} nor trigger {{tip|on-attack}} effects, but it will still apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects. Additionally, ''Twin Bite's'' empowered attack has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shyvana's next basic attack within 6 seconds gains 25 bonus range, deals 100% AD (+ 35% AP) and causes her to strike again after 0.25 seconds, which deals bonus physical damage and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
Basic attacks reduce Twin Bite's cooldown by 0.5 seconds on-hit.
Twin Bite resets Shyvana's basic attack timer.
Shyvana's Dragon Form Bonus: Shyvana instantly attacks enemies in a cone around the target before applying Twin Bite's effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal 100% AD (+ 35% AP) physical damage, are affected by critical strike modifiers, and apply on-hit effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot critically strike nor trigger on-attack effects, but it will still apply on-hit effects. Additionally, Twin Bite's empowered attack has an uncancellable windup.
q1.notes:
*''Dragon Form's'' ''Twin Bite'' cannot apply {{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Cleave}} on each target hit because of {{nies|Cleave}} internal {{fd|0.05}} seconds interval during which it cannot be applied on a different target.
* Both strikes belong to the same {{tip|cast instance}}.
* Since the second strike applies after the ability goes on cooldown, it will reduce its own cooldown.
* Unlike most [[on-hit]] effects, the one reducing the cooldown of ''Twin Bite'' also triggers against {{tip|turret|structures}}.
* In ''Dragon Form'', ''Twin Bite'' consumes an additional stack of {{ri|Hail of Blades}}. {{bug}}

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: % AD (+ 25% AP)

w1.name: Burnout
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' creates a flame aura for 3 seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|decaying '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} each {{fd|0.5}} seconds to nearby enemies.

During this time, '''Shyvana's''' basic attacks deal additional {{as|magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}} equal to 50% of ''Burnout's'' per-tick damage to surrounding enemies and extend the duration of ''Burnout'' by 1 second, which can occur up to 4 times for a total 4 seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}} Bonus:}} The aura is enlarged, scaling with {{ais|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} rank.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shyvana creates a flame aura for 3 seconds, gaining decaying bonus movement speed and dealing magic damage each 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies.
During this time, Shyvana's basic attacks deal additional magic damage on-hit equal to 50% of Burnout's per-tick damage to surrounding enemies and extend the duration of Burnout by 1 second, which can occur up to 4 times for a total 4 seconds.
Shyvana's Dragon Form Bonus: The aura is enlarged, scaling with Shyvana's Dragon's Descent rank.
w1.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: {{as|Magic damage}} on-hit's interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 8% per 100 AP)
  • Bonus Movement Speed Decay: %
  • Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 10% bonus AD)

e1.name: Flame Breath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.

'''Shyvana's''' basic attacks against marked enemies deal {{as|{{fd|3.75}}% of the target's {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}, capped at 150 against monsters.

{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}} Bonus:}} The fireball deals increased {{as|magic damage}} and explodes upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} or reaching the target location, creating a scorched field for 4 seconds. Enemies within the field are marked once and dealt {{pp|30 to 60 for 13|6 to 18|formula=30 + 2.5 per level|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 5% AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.
Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies deal 3.75% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage on-hit, capped at 150 against monsters.
Shyvana's Dragon Form Bonus: The fireball deals increased magic damage and explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, creating a scorched field for 4 seconds. Enemies within the field are marked once and dealt 6 to 18 ‒ undefined (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.
leveling:

{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}

r1.name: Dragon's Descent
description: {{sbc|Passive - Fury:}} ''Dragon's Descent'' requires {{tip|Fury|{{as|100 Fury}}}} to be cast. '''Shyvana''' generates {{as|Fury}} per second while alive and in {{sbc|Human form}} and {{as|2 Fury}} per basic attack {{tip|on-hit}} in either form. '''Shyvana''' gains {{as|100 Fury}} upon learning ''Dragon's Descent''.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' transforms into {{sbc|Dragon Form}} and {{tip|dash|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies she passes through and {{tip|airborne|carrying}} them alongside her.

{{sbc|Dragon Form}}: '''Shyvana''' gains {{sti|health|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}}, {{sti|range|'''bonus''' attack range}}, and increased [[size]]. Her abilities are also empowered to apply an additional effect. She maintains {{sbc|Dragon Form}} at a recurring cost of {{as|Fury}}, returning to {{as|Human Form|buzzword3}} once all {{as|Fury}} has been depleted.
''Dragon's Descent will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent requires 100 Fury to be cast. Shyvana generates Fury per second while alive and in Human form and 2 Fury per basic attack on-hit in either form. Shyvana gains 100 Fury upon learning Dragon's Descent.
Active: Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form and dashes with displacement immunity to the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through and carrying them alongside her.
Dragon Form: Shyvana gains bonus health, bonus attack range, and increased size. Her abilities are also empowered to apply an additional effect. She maintains Dragon Form at a recurring cost of Fury, returning to Human Form once all Fury has been depleted.
Dragon's Descent will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
